properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee krupa ningi nantenu vachchina vaare Daya pondedaru neeve dayaaludavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee viswaasyatha goppadi unnatha mainadi Andari yedala ennadu maaranidi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee neethi stira mainadi parisheelinchedavu Yella prajalanu sarididdu vaada veeve{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amoolyamu nee karuna vachchina vaariki Ashraya mitchi rekkalatho kappedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee inta thrupti galadu aananda jalamunu Thraaga nitchedavu nee prajalandariki{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee prakaashamu niluchu ninnerigi yunna Vaari pai niratham mendaina krupanithuvu{/lang-eng}
